summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 FORD F150. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE ACCELERATING TO ENTER HIGHWAY, THE VEHICLE LUNGED FORWARD AND THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO SHAKE VIOLENTLY BEFORE IT STALLED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER WHERE THE FAILURE WAS UNABLE TO BE DUPLICATED. THE MANUFACTURE WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 222 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 61,243.
